data.title: THE HIRE – ‘STAR’
data.meta_description: BMW The Hire 'Star' was a short film directed by Guy Ritchie featuring Madonna, this was released in 2001 and part of The Hire a series for BMW

It does not store any personal data.geosessionThis cookie is used for identifying the geographical location by country of the user.sp_landing1 dayThe sp_landing is set by Spotify to implement audio content from Spotify on the website and also registers information on user interaction related to the audio content.sp_t1 yearThe sp_t cookie is set by Spotify to implement audio content from Spotify on the website and also registers information on user interaction related to the audio content.
